TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityCodeGenerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Generates object context and entity classes (object layer code) from conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files. Starting with Entity Framework version 4, an ObjectContext class for a specific model contains properties of type <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectSet%601> that represent the modelâ€™s entity sets.

Docs.param: The language of the generated code.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified language option.

.property instance class System.Data.Entity.Design.EdmToObjectNamespaceMap EdmToObjectNamespaceMap

Docs.summary: Gets an that contains the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to code namespace mappings.
Docs.value: The CSDL to code namespace mappings.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath);

Docs.param: The path of the CSDL file.
The path of the file that contains the generated object layer code.
Docs.summary: Creates a source code file that contains the object layer code generated from the specified conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, System.IO.TextWriter target);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(class System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, class System.IO.TextWriter target) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the CSDL.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which the object layer code is written.
Docs.summary: Generates object layer code using the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) specified in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, and outputs the generated code to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> additionalEdmSchemaFilePaths);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> additionalEdmSchemaFilePaths) cil managed

Docs.param: The path of the CSDL file.
The path of the file that contains the generated object layer code.
A list of schema file paths that can be used to resolve any references in the source schema (the CSDL file). If the source schema does not have any dependencies, pass in an empty list.
Docs.summary: Creates a source code file that contains object layer code generated from the specified conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file. The list of schema file paths is used to resolve any references contained in the CSDL file.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, Version targetEntityFrameworkVersion);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(string sourceEdmSchemaFilePath, string targetPath, class System.Version targetEntityFrameworkVersion) cil managed

Docs.param: The path of the CSDL file.
The path of the file that contains the generated object layer code.
The internal Entity Framework version that is being targeted.
Docs.summary: Creates a source code file that contains the object layer code generated from the specified conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) file. Note that the targetEntityFrameworkVersion parameter uses internal Entity Framework version numbers as described in the class.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, System.IO.TextWriter target, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Xml.XmlReader> additionalEdmSchemas);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode(class System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, class System.IO.TextWriter target, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.XmlReader> additionalEdmSchemas) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the CSDL.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the generated object layer code.
A list of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects that contain schemas that are referenced by the source schema (the CSDL). If the source schema does not have any dependencies, pass in an empty list.
Docs.summary: Generates object layer code based on the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) specified in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, then outputs the generated code to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>. A list of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects is used to resolve any references that are contained in the CSDL.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError> GenerateCode (System.Xml.XmlReader sourceEdmSchema, System.IO.TextWriter target, Version targetEntityFrameworkVersion);

Docs.param: An XmlReader that contains the CSDL.
The TextWriter to which the object layer code is written.
The internal Entity Framework version that is being targeted.
Docs.summary: Generates object layer code using the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) specified in the XmlReader object, and outputs the generated code to a TextWriter. Note that the targetEntityFrameworkVersion parameter uses internal EntityFramework version numbers as described in the class.
Docs.returns: A list of objects that contains any generated errors.
